title: So what is Heimerdinger's skill-order supposed to be?
body:
Often time the ability that scales best and focuses on DPS is what gets maxed last as only by that point will you get enough AP to really make it matter, whereas early game you're often better off with the bursty abilities that relies more on base than scaling.


However, Heimerdinger is...unique. Unique in that he does literally everything with his turrets. Should he level up his rockets first or should he level his signature turrets first?

replies.body:
assassin donger: missles
troll donger: turrets

I love the way you put it.

All depends on you and what you're facing. 

If you're vs someone who can easily take your turrets out, rockets may be better as first, or wave the two. You don't have race to max one first. 

Get your turrets to where you're happy with them then get your rockets is generally the best setup. If you're feeling OK at rank 3, Stop at rank 3. You can hold 2 charges at that point and the turrets scaling is also factored to your level.
Maxing out his turrets first has always worked best for me. Provides great farm and protection during the laning phase. I max out rockets seconds, but it's all up to your play style.

What makes me hesitant to max his turrets first is that he puts all his money on his turrets...which are rather easy to kill if it's someone like TF who can take it out with a single shot of his nuke or blue.
